page.title: 06A Breamore housewife's day
page.content: I've lived in Breamore for just over two years now.We're restoring a thatched cottage sited just on the edge of the village common,and loving every minute of it. A typical day for me begins rather early with my husband feeding the outside part of our menagerie(ducks,geese,horses) while I feed the inside(my two sons , the dogs and the cats).I then run my elder son to the local school,my husband leaves for work in the city and I've got the day to devote to gardening,housework (Ugh!) and my baby,one of Dr Steptoe's test-tube miracles. He keeps me busy so I take little part in village community life. Perhaps I shall one day but for now,I enjoy my own company and the tranquility that, for me, is quite the nicest thing about living in Breamore.
